ej,asprb101,P,varge901,HBP non-call (Reversed) $Bob Aspromonte claimed that he was hit by a pitch but HP umpire Ed Vargo ruled it a foul ball; Aspromonte ejected but then Vargo reversed his decision and awarded the HBP

ej,santr102,P,pelec901,Called strike 3 $Santo ejected by HP umpire Pelekoudas for arguing strike 3

$Del Crandall batted out of turn and walked; Mack Jones batted out of turn and singled; the Cubs point out the mistake to HP umpire Stan Landes, who ruled Bob Hendley, who was supposed to follow Crandall in the original order, was out
ej,bellg103,P,boggd901,Called third strike Gus Bell ejected by HP umpire Dusty Boggess
$Bob Purkey charged Ron Santo after they exchanged words as Santo crossed the diamond going back to the bench; both benches cleared
$Dick Bertell arrived after the start of the game following his discharge from the Army
